contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=August 2007}}[[Image:Lars Kagg, 1623.jpg|thumb]] Count '''Lars Kagg''' (1595–1661) was a [[Sweden|Swedish]] soldier and politician. He was appointed [[Privy Council of Sweden|Privy Councilor]] in 1641, [[List of Swedish Field Marshals|Field Marshal]] in 1648 and [[Lord High Constable of Sweden|Lord High Constable]] in 1660. In the [[Thirty Years' War]] (1618–1648), he commanded troops at the [[Battle of Oldendorf]], in 1633. {{Authority control|VIAF=243269122}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Kagg, Lars | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Swedish Field Marshal | DATE OF BIRTH = 1595 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = 1661 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Kagg, Lars}} [[Category:1595 births]] [[Category:1661 deaths]] [[Category:Field Marshals of Sweden]] [[Category:Swedish nobility]] [[Category:Members of the Privy Council of Sweden]] [[Category:17th-century Swedish people]]
